alert.note: Alert for Schuyler; Steuben (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 10:16PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Schuyler and Steuben Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1016 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Alfred to near Coudersport. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corning, Hornell, Bath, Campbell, Canisteo, Caton, Lindley, Painted Post, Addison and Woodhull. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 34 North and 47. Interstate 390 near 1. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
